title: "AWS, SLB, Shell Team Up to Explore ‘Subsurface Data Universe’"
excerpt: "SLB on Oct. 10 announced an agreement to deliver digital end-to-end workflows using Open Subsurface Data Universe (OSDU) data platform standards for Shell using SLB subsurface solutions on AWS cloud infrastructure. The platform gathers and stores all data in one centralized cloud solution."
